Package org.skistation.services

Class SkiScheduleService

java.lang.Object
org.skistation.services.SkiScheduleService
@Service public class SkiScheduleService extends Object
Represents a ski schedule service class. It provides methods to perform operations on the ski schedule table in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new ski schedule service with the specified ski schedule repository.

      Returns:
